name: Before Deadline
description:
Your colleagues have a deadline to catch and needs to finish and deliver their papers to the boss' office. You decide to sabotage and delay your colleagues by blocking their path to the office so you can eliminate your competition and climb the corporate ladder. This game was made for the "WonderJam 3" - game jam, with the theme: "SABOTAGE". 

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move
